text: 160 (one hundred sixty) is a whole number. It comes after 159 and before 161. == In mathematics == *Even number: 160 is even because it can be divided by 2 without a remainder. *Composite number: 160 is composite, which means it has more factors than just 1 and itself. The prime factorization of 160 is 2^5×5. *Roman numerals: 160 can be written as CLX in Roman numerals. == In measurement == *In the United States, people sometimes cook certain foods (like ground beef) to at least 160 °F (about 71 °C) to be sure they are safe to eat. == Related pages == *159 *161 Category:Integers
title: 160 (number)
